You forget, when Airrazor came out of her stasis lock
and blew up Terrasaur his head went offline
immediately.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > No I think until he became Thrust Waspinator's
> spark
> > was in his head (I can assume he was a special
> model
> > Predicon because they never showed where his spark
> was
> > just where other bots had their sparks).  This
> could
> > explain his ability to get blown up.  The Spark is
> > everything.  If it dies so does everything. 
> Beside's
> > if logic were in the head you wouldn't need it to
> > revive Waspinator, but they never threw it out as
> a
> > useless waist of power.
> > 
> it seems like Inferno, Waspinator and Terrorsaur
> where the ones that 
> always got blown up, they might have been the same
> type of model or 
> something.
> 
>
